Download:
You can download the Ankh installer from:
http://ankhsvn.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectDocumentList
NOTE: Before you start the installation please close all instances of Microsoft Visual studio .NET
How to install:
1. Start the installer.
2. Click the 'Next' button.
3. Read through and accept the license agreement. Select 'I agree' and then click the 'Next' button, or 'Cancel' if you do not agree to the license agreement.
4. Choose the destination folder where you want the Ankh addin to be installed.
5. Click 'Next' to start the installation, or 'Cancel' to exit.
6. Click 'Yes' if you want to install a test repository and a working copy.
7. Select the destination for the test repository and the working copy.
8. Please read through the 'README' file for known issues, installation problems and other issues conserning the Ankh addin.
How to disable the addin:
1. Open the 'Add-in manager' in Visual Studio .NET (It can be found under the 'Tools' menu).
2. Deselect Ankh under 'Available add-ins' .
How to uninstall:
There are to ways to uninstall Ankh. You can use Ankh installer, or you can use Windows 'Add/remove program' wizard. Both will completly remove the Ankh Addin from your system.
Uninstallation with the Ankh installer:
1. Start Ankh intaller.
2. Select the 'Remove AnkhSVN addin' button.
3. Press 'Next'.
Uninstalling with Windows 'Add/remove program' wizard :
1. Start the 'Add/Remove programs' wizard (Found under Start -> Settings -> Control Panel
2. Locate 'AnkhSVN Addin'.
3. Select 'Remove'.
